name: Sound Of Memory (LastDays)
description:
Story

In this visual novel, you embody a disembodied voice which is keeping Lizbet company, a young woman who after returning from work finds her house completely dark and because of her fears does not dare to turn them on. 

----------

Gameplay

Choose answers and interact with the scenario to move forward.

Interactable objects: lamp - switches - bag
